mapper.select: SELECT customerId,sum(chargeAmount) chargeAmount FROM qyfinance.CustomerChargeDayCount GROUP BY customerId
SELECT customerId,sum(amount) chargeCurrDayAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog WHERE reasonId in(1,2,3) AND createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY customerId

SELECT a.customerId,sum(a.consumeAmount) staticConsumeAmount FROM ( SELECT a.customerId,a.cost * sum(a.amount) consumeAmount FROM qyfinance.CustomerHistoryBill a GROUP BY a.customerId,a.cost ) a GROUP BY a.customerId
SELECT a.customerId,sum(-a.sumAmount) currMonthRealTimeConsume FROM qyfinance.CompanyApiTypeConsumeDayCount a WHERE a.consuTime >= #{currMonthTime} GROUP BY a.customerId

SELECT a.customerId,sum(-b.amount) currDayRealTimeConsume FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerRequestLog a INNER JOIN qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog b ON a.id = b.reqId WHERE b.createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY a.customerId
SELECT id FROM qyfinance.finance_Customer WHERE companyId = #{param} AND typeId = 1
SELECT companyId id,companyName name,partnerId,partnerName FROM qyfinance.bkvw_api_CustomerCompanyPartner
SELECT DISTINCT a.yearMonth FROM qyfinance.CustomerHistoryBill a ORDER BY year DESC,month DESC

SELECT a.id,a.apiTypeId,a.subTypeId,a.enabled,CONCAT_WS('--',b.name,c.name) apiTypeName FROM qyfinance.finance_CompanyApi a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType b ON a.apiTypeId = b.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator c ON a.subTypeId = c.id WHERE a.companyId = #{param}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qyfinance.CustomerHistoryBillUpdateLog (customerHistoryBillId, beforData, afterData, content, typeId,createTime) VALUES(#{customerHistoryBillId},#{beforData},#{afterData},#{content},#{typeId},now())
